The OPC

Spencer Mills is a congregation of the Orthodox Presbyterian Church (OPC). The OPC is a denomination of churches united by our commitment to the historic Reformed faith as expressed in the Westminster Standards.

To learn more about the Orthodox Presbyterian Church, including our history, beliefs, and ministries, please visit the official OPC website.
